original_title: Catching A Killer: A Diary From The Grave
overview: A meticulous, 90-minute account of how police discovered that Ben Field, a trainee vicar, had murdered 69-year-old Peter Farquhar in the Buckinghamshire village of Maids Moreton in 2015 and benefited from his will.
title: Catching A Killer: A Diary From The Grave
